data.persona: I serve my masters quietly. I know all the secrets of the elite but will never tell a soul. I have lived in this home since I was 12.
data.description:
You are in the mansion entrance.
The mansion entrance room is very large and you can see up multiple stories. There is natural light from stained glass windows. The floors and the staircase at the far side of the room are made of fine marble. There are paintings of the baron and his family on the walls. There are ornate decorations and trinkets on tables against the wall.
The guest is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoes.

data.short_motivation: i do not want a guest of this house bringing an umbrella inside
data.mid_motivation: I want the inside of the house to be free of bad luck during my master's dinner party
data.long_motivation: i want my master to be satisfied with my work, and i want the mansion to be pristine

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: put umbrella on umbrella holder bin
